event.title: fell victim to his father-in-law, Raja Sidh Sen, who in 1728

data.event: Raja Prithi Pal fell victim to his father-in-law, Raja Sidh Sen, who in 1728 invited him to Mandi on the pretext of seeking his assistance against the Raja of Suket.

event.title: was kindly received, but within a month

data.event: He was kindly received, but within a month of his arrival he was beguiled into the Damdama Fort, and there murdered.
